Reviews.Title: 3rd time I've purchased a Casio
Reviews.Author: McHops "Wacky"
Reviews.Content: I really do love this camera, takes great photos and easy to hike with-light and easy to use.the only problem is that my other two have quit working within a couple of years, due to the lens getting off track and cost to repair way too high.  Wish they could fix that problem!  Otherwise, best camera I've ever owned.

ProductInfo.Features:
effective-pixels: 14,100,000-pixel
optical zoom: 10 time (at time of super-resolution zoom combined use 15 times)
battery lives : about 600 sheets (CIPA standard)
ProductInfo.Name: Casio Exilim EX-H20G 14 MP, 10x Optical Zoom Compact Digital Camera (Silver)
